## Quaternion.dot() method

Calculates the dot product of two Quaternion's.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static dot(a: Quaternion, b: Quaternion): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [Quaternion](doc/markdown/./base.quaternion.md) | The first operand. |
|  b | [Quaternion](doc/markdown/./base.quaternion.md) | The second operand. |

**Returns:**

number

dot product of a and b
